
=head1 NAME

term

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Terms that have a specific lexicon and context.

=head1 FIELDS

 identifier (character varying) - A globally unique identifier for this term (a UUID).
 lexicon_identifier (character varying) - The lexicon associated with this term.
 context_identifier (character varying) - The context associated with this term.
 context_version (character varying) - The version of the context associated with this term (optional).
 term (character varying) - The term itself.
 is_root (boolean) - A flag indicating the term is at the top level (eg, no broader term).
 description (character varying) - A description of the term.
 url (character varying) - A url for further information.


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                                            Table "gcis_metadata.term"
        Column       |       Type        |              Modifiers              | Storage  | Stats target |                              Description                              
 --------------------+-------------------+-------------------------------------+----------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------
  identifier         | character varying | not null default uuid_generate_v1() | extended |              | A globally unique identifier for this term (a UUID).
  lexicon_identifier | character varying | not null                            | extended |              | The lexicon associated with this term.
  context_identifier | character varying | not null                            | extended |              | The context associated with this term.
  context_version    | character varying | default ''::character varying       | extended |              | The version of the context associated with this term (optional).
  term               | character varying | not null                            | extended |              | The term itself.
  is_root            | boolean           | default false                       | plain    |              | A flag indicating the term is at the top level (eg, no broader term).
  description        | character varying |                                     | extended |              | A description of the term.
  url                | character varying |                                     | extended |              | A url for further information.
 Indexes:
     "term_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (identifier)
     "term_unique" UNIQUE CONSTRAINT, btree (lexicon_identifier, context_identifier, context_version, term)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "term_lexicon_context_version_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (lexicon_identifier, context_identifier, context_version) REFERENCES context(lexicon_identifier, identifier, version) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "term_map" CONSTRAINT "term_map_term_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (term_identifier) REFERENCES term(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
     TABLE "term_rel" CONSTRAINT "term_rel_obj_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (term_object) REFERENCES term(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
     TABLE "term_rel" CONSTRAINT "term_rel_subj_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (term_subject) REFERENCES term(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON term FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON term FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
